p: Antioxidant properties of the EO from L. pubescens were evaluated by using the following methods: the 2,2â€²-azino-bis (3-ethylbenzo thiazoline-6-sulphonic acid) ABTS radical cation decolorization and reductive potential (RP) assays as reported previously [ 19, 20]. Trolox, ascorbic acid, and BHT were used as standard antioxidants.
